snippet.title: Ghost Exile - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Ghost Exile - is a cooperative horror from 1 to 4 players: when hunting for ghosts, you need to determine the type of ghost, carry out a ritual of exorcism and then the ghost can no longer harm anyone. Be careful! Hasty conclusions can lead you to a sad outcome.

Available for purchase! https://store.steampowered.com/app/1807080/Ghost_Exile/

#indiedev #game #horror #ghost #ghosthunting #supernatural #gamedev #indiegame #steam #horrorgame #scare #wishlist #fear #scream #ghostexile
